labels.LABEL_4: Record one procedure at a time and click the + button to add more procedures

concepts.AAPREOP,_OUTCOME_OF_INITIAL_ANESTHESIA_A: Outcome of initial anesthesia assessment, comments
concepts.AAPREOP,_MALLAMPATI_CLASS_18_DESC: I: soft palate, uvula, and pillars are visible, II: soft palate and uvula are visible, III: only the soft palate and base of the uvula are visible, IV: only the hard palate is visible.
